name: Tank Blazers
description: Tank Blazers is a fast, action-packed local multiplayer-only arcade game that brings back the joyful days of playing games together on the couch! Built entirely for local multiplayer (either split-screen or in single-view mode), you can prove once again you're the better player.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 3870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.6 GHz+ Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 6800 Series Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
